items.title: Text scammers make tens of thousands a month - and spend it on designer shoes and bags
items.description: The tactics and spoils of smishing - scam texts that trick people into disclosing data - are revealed.

items.title: Russian drone and missile strikes hit residential buildings in several Kyiv districts
items.description: The attack on Ukraine's capital early on Saturday killed one person and injured seven, city officials said.

items.title: No 10 denies Reeves misled public in run-up to Budget
items.description: The Conservatives say she was overly gloomy about the public finances as a "smokescreen" to raise tax.

items.title: Planes grounded after Airbus discovers solar radiation could impact systems
items.description: The issue is thought to affect 6,000 planes, which will need to undergo an urgent software update or have computers replaced.

items.title: How Trump's pledge to tackle Sudan atrocities could play out
items.description: The war is being fuelled by regional powers and the US president may have some leverage over them.
